data.lyric:
[ti:Rudolph the Red Nosed Reindeer]
[ar:Gene Autry]
[al:A Very Special Time: 20 All Time Wonderful Christmas Songs]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Rudolph the Red Nosed Reindeer - Gene Autry
[00:02.42]Composed by：Marks John D
[00:04.84]You know Dasher and Dancer and Prancer and Vixen
[00:10.11]Comet and Cupid and Donner and Blitzen
[00:14.36]But do you recall the most famous reindeer of all
[00:24.75]Rudolph the red-nosed reindeer had a very shiny nose
[00:31.97]And if you ever saw it you would even say it glows
[00:39.34]All of the other reindeer used to laugh and call him names
[00:46.61]They never let poor Rudolph join in any reindeer games
[00:53.80]Then one foggy Christmas Eve Santa came to say
[01:01.06]Rudolph with your nose so bright won't you guide my sleigh tonight
[01:08.21]Then how the reindeer loved him as they shouted out with glee
[01:15.36]Rudolph the red-nosed reindeer you'll go down in history
[01:51.45]Rudolph the red-nosed reindeer had a very shiny nose
[01:58.50]And if you ever saw it you would even say it glows
[02:05.80]All of the other reindeer used to laugh and call him names
[02:12.99]They never let poor Rudolph join in any reindeer games
[02:20.40]Then one foggy Christmas Eve Santa came to say
[02:27.67]Rudolph with your nose so bright won't you guide my sleigh tonight
[02:34.79]Then how the reindeer loved him as they shouted out with glee
[02:42.09]Rudolph the red-nosed reindeer you'll go down in history
data.trans:
[ti:Rudolph the Red Nosed Reindeer]
[ar:Gene Autry]
[al:A Very Special Time: 20 All Time Wonderful Christmas Songs]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.42]//
[00:04.84]你认识Dasher和Dancer 也知道Prancer和Vixen
[00:10.11]了解Comet和Cupid 以及Donner和Blitzen
[00:14.36]你是否会想起 最出名的驯鹿
[00:24.75]红鼻子的驯鹿Rudolph 有一个很闪耀的鼻子
[00:31.97]如果你有机会看到 你也会说它很特别
[00:39.34]而其它所有的驯鹿 曾经取笑他并称它为匹诺曹
[00:46.61]嫌弃可怜的Rudolph 参加任何驯鹿的游戏
[00:53.80]然后在一个雾蒙蒙的圣诞节前夜 圣诞老人来了 他说
[01:01.06]Rudolph的鼻子闪闪发亮 你今晚可以为我拉雪橇吗
[01:08.21]然后驯鹿都十分爱他 他们大声欢呼着
[01:15.36]红鼻子的驯鹿Rudolph 你即将被载入史册
[01:51.45]红鼻子的驯鹿Rudolph 有一个很闪耀的鼻子
[01:58.50]如果你有机会看到 你也会说它很特别
[02:05.80]而其它所有的驯鹿 曾经取笑他并称它为匹诺曹
[02:12.99]嫌弃可怜的Rudolph 参加任何驯鹿的游戏
[02:20.40]然后在一个雾蒙蒙的圣诞节前夜 圣诞老人来了 他说
[02:27.67]晚可以为我拉雪橇吗
[02:34.79]然后驯鹿都十分爱他 他们大声欢呼着
[02:42.09]红鼻子的驯鹿Rudolph 你即将被载入史册
